content.question: How you'll be contacted
content.communicateParagraph1: You'll be sent emails by the court throughout the divorce. You must agree to receive these emails to use this service.
content.communicateParagraph2: The court will send email notifications to:
content.communicateParagraph3: You can provide a UK phone number as another way for the court to contact you. This is optional.
content.confidentialContactDetails: Your email address and phone number will be kept confidential from your {{ divorceWho }}.
content.petitionerConsent: I agree that the divorce centre can send me notifications and deliver (serve) court documents to me by email.

petitionerPhoneNumber.invalid: Enter a valid telephone number. Telephone number must be a minimum length of 9 and can only contain the numbers 0-9 and the symbols +, - , ( , ) , .

petitionerConsent.required: You must agree to receive notifications and court documents by email to use this service.
